content: click here for free pattern tutorial ** no sew mini dinosaur crochet tutorial 1 ** click here to purchase our printable pdf pattern ** no sew mini dinosaur crochet pdf 2 ** we re crafting something small adorable and perfect keychain size its a mini no-sew dinosaur if you love cute quirky amigurumi this tutorial is perfect for you what do you think of a pint size dinosaur that is crocheted all in one and no sew it looks super cute in any color combination too join us as we guide you through the entire process of making this tiny dinosaur from start to finish with our easy-to-follow instructions you ll have your own mini dinosaur in no time whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out you ll find this tutorial project both enjoyable and rewarding **note - this patern is a little complicated do use the video chapters below to watch the parts of the video again if you have any queries you will need * yarn - any sort of yarn in a lighter shade and a darker shade i use medium weight yarn in leaf green and forest green * a small amount of black yarn for the eyes * crochet hook * yarn needle * stitch markers * stuffing i use medium weight yarn and a 3mm hook if you want your mini dinosaur to be the same size as mine use any yarn that can fit well on a 3mm/no 5 hook in this tutorial you ll learn * how to crochet a mini dinosaur * step-by-step crochet instructions with detailed visualss ✨ why you ll love this tutorial * full crochet mini dinosaur tutorial * clear easy-to-follow instructions * high-quality close-up visuals to guide you through each step * a fun and rewarding project that would make a great gift 1 https //youtu be/bmc1ptaj_r0 2 https //crochetmusings net/products/no-sew-mini-dinosaur-crochet-pattern-pdf
